Text: Sisters of Wellber:  Directed by Takayuki Hamana (浜名 孝行 , Hamana Takayuki ) , the director behind the renowned Prince of Tennis TV series and animated movies, "Sisters of Wellber" began airing in Japan on Tokyo MX, Mētele, ABC, and AT-X in April 2007.
